item.title: Rust Is the new C
item.description: In this post I will experiment with Rust as a safer C replacement. The idea is to combine a couple of C dependencies in Rust, to do some work using the dependencies in Rust and to expose a final API from a Rust library as C ABI. Then I will consume the same exported Rust method from a number of modern languages/platforms such as C#, Python, Java, Nodejs, R, Go and even back from C/C++.
